lw3dge.graphics.shaders

Class StaticShader

  • java.lang.Object
    • lw3dge.graphics.shaders.ShaderProgram
      • lw3dge.graphics.shaders.StaticShader

  • public class StaticShader
extends ShaderProgram
    A static shader to shade most objects Credit to ThinMatrix and his OpenGL Tutorials
    Author:
    Jared Massa
